DJANGO_SECRET_KEY.description: A secret key for verifying the integrity of signed cookies.

DEBUG.description: Whether or not the application is running in DEBUG mode (DO NOT ENABLE IN PRODUCTION)

ROLLBAR_ENABLED.description: Whether or warnings and errors should be sent to Rollbar for analysis (default=True)

ACCOUNT_EMAIL_REQUIRED.description: Whether users must provide a valid email before using the service (default=True)

ACCOUNT_REQUIRED.description: Whether a user must have an account to access the site (default=False)

ADMIN_EMAIL_ADDRESS.description: Website admin's email address. Used as default email address for sending/receiving email

DEFAULT_FROM_EMAIL.description: Default email address for sending emails to users (default=ADMIN_EMAIL_ADDRESS)

scripts.postdeploy: python manage.py migrate && python manage.py loaddata source_tags && python manage.py check --deploy
